CustomField.description: -Works with CS team to develop effective pricing strategies, balancing economy, customer segments, company objectives & customer satisfaction -Establish revenue strategy that supports HT's position in local market -Ensure demand forecasting & sound revenue forecasting & practices are in place to maximise yield -Identifies ways to grow sales, & market share by researching & staying aware of competitor strategies -Cost Management
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Works with CS team to develop effective pricing strategies, balancing economy, customer segments, company objectives & customer satisfaction -Establish revenue strategy that supports HT's position in local market -Ensure demand forecasting & sound revenue forecasting & practices are in place to maximise yield -Identifies ways to grow sales, & market share by researching & staying aware of competitor strategies -Cost Management
CustomField.label: Quotation Management [GM]
